Package BrickDestroy.Gameplay_Model.Brick

Class SteelBrick

java.lang.Object
BrickDestroy.Gameplay_Model.Brick.Brick
BrickDestroy.Gameplay_Model.Brick.SteelBrick
public class SteelBrick extends Brick
SteelBrick extends Brick and indicates a brick that is made of steel. Even though it only has 1 hit point, it can be only damage based on a 40% probability roll in every hit.

This makes it the most durable brick in the game, with the average hit needed to brake the brick being 2.5 hits.

    • collidedWithBall

      public int collidedWithBall(javafx.geometry.Point2D point, int dir)
      Invoked when collision between ball and the brick is detected.

      It has 40% to be broken every time it gets hit by the ball.

      Overrides:
      collidedWithBall in class Brick
      Parameters:
      point - the point where the ball and brick collided
      dir - the part of the brick where it collided (up, down, left or right)
      Returns:
      score worth of the brick (as indicator of a hit)

    • impact

      protected void impact()
      Rolls the 40% probability die. If the roll is successful, only then the brick is damaged,and since it has only 1 hit point, it will be brpken.
      Overrides:
      impact in class Brick
